Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Message>

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Message>
    This is a model that i used to pass messages from connection thread to the main thread Then, main thread will handle them and decide what message to send to peers
